# containsTime(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the time range contains a time.

## Declaration

```swift
func containsTime(_ time: CMTime) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **time**: A time value to test for in the time range.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the time range contains the `time` value; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Finding Elements

- **containsTimeRange(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the time range contains another time range.
